Title: Full stack Developer
Description:
Responsible for maintaining the existing two security tools, creating one new security app based on client needs and enhancing one existing security app to be fast and more flexible with the current tech stack which improved by 50% of its performance.

• Maintain and enhance two existing web applications using Django and PostgreSQL, addressing bugs and improving performance by 5-10%.
• Refine the Docker setup for these applications by improving the Dockerfile and incorporating Docker Compose for greater deployment flexibility.
• Support an existing REST API for security monitoring tools built with Flask and Elasticsearch, adding new features, fixing bugs, and boosting performance by 10%.
• Redesign the frontend UI for security monitoring tools from scratch in collaboration with the UI/UX team, following their guidelines, and utilising Next.js and TypeScript to create a maintainable codebase that enhances performance and user experience by nearly 50%.
• Develop dashboards for security monitoring metrics using Next.js and TypeScript by visualising Elasticsearch data, allowing for visualisation without relying upon the Kibana dashboard.
• Collaborate with the dev-ops team to integrate security monitoring tools into SIEM (Security Information and Event Management) systems like Wazuh via REST API.

Title: Software Engineer
Description:
BMG Indonesia is a dedicated client of a Japanese retail company (USMH) in Indonesia. Assigned to handle the REST API for their product and process their billion-data inventory in 2022. Also responsible for maintaining several Odoo modules based on client needs in 2023.

Backend Developer (2022):
• Maintain and enhance three backend services (Go, PHP/Laravel, and Flask) using MySQL databases, by adding features, fixing bugs, and improving performance by 5-10%.
• Containerise a Flask service with Docker and Docker Compose for deployment flexibility.
• Collaborate with data analysts to optimise SQL scripts for preprocessing billions of inventory data using PostgreSQL and BigQuery.
• Work with data analysts to create dashboards from processed inventory data using Metabase and Power BI.

Odoo Developer (2023):
•Maintain and enhance seven customised Odoo modules (three approval, three expense, and one inventory) by adding features and fixing bugs.
• Customise two Odoo-based modules (one HR and one helpdesk) with maintainable codebases, implementing additional features based on user needs.
• Implement eight existing Odoo modules (three approvals, one HR, three expense, and one helpdesk) with Docker and Docker Compose in a staging environment.
• Deploy two Odoo modules (one HR and one helpdesk) with Docker and Docker Compose in a production environment for improved deployment flexibility.
• Collaborate with QA and functional teams to deliver features and improvements to clients, and work with team members in Vietnam and Japan.

Title: Machine Learning Intern
CompanyName: Bangkit Academy led by Google, Tokopedia, Gojek, & Traveloka
Description:
• Gather image data from various internet sources, combining datasets from Kaggle and GitHub.Preprocess combined datasets using Pandas, NumPy, OpenCV, and Scikit-Learn.
• Build and train models, implementing transfer learning and fine-tuning using ResNet50 with TensorFlow GPU.
• Collaborate with the cloud computing team to deploy the model via REST API to Google Cloud using FastAPI, and reduce its size with TensorFlow Lite.
• Implement Docker for REST API deployment with the cloud computing team.
• Integrate the model with a simple web app using FastAPI and jQuery in collaboration with the cloud computing team.
• Work with the cloud computing and Android development teams to provide the model and REST API for integration with a native Kotlin app.
Skills: Data Visualization,Docker Products,Big Data,Google Cloud Platform (GCP),Python (Programming Language),Data Analysis,Data Engineering,Machine Learning,TensorFlow

Title: Graphic Designer
CompanyName: UIN Syarif Hidayatullah Jakarta (Himpunan Mahasiswa Fisika)
Description:
My role in this organization was a Creative Team under the Department of Information and Communication (in 2020, I was head of the HIMAFI Department of Information and Communication). I was responsible for some job desks, which majority is designers, so my job desk was:
• Design some content for HIMAFI social media
• Design banners, flyers, posters, brochures and billboards for HIMAFI organization activity
• Design and Maintain HIMAFI Website
